Put the two html files together in a directory on you hard drive.
Dubbleclick on the file "Start Quick Torrent Search.htm"
Now a search window will open at the top in your browser.
You can now add this page to you favorites bookmarks.



In the dir "No Ads" is a HOST file that you can copy to:

c:WINDOWSSYSTEM32DRIVERSETC

then you will get rid of allot of ads and pop ups.

Happy searching !
